p: When CCl 4 was incorporated in the body of mice it decreased the level of all enzymes when compared to normal level (normal group). However, after treatment of 300 mg/kg b. w methanol flower extracts, levels of these parameters remained increased on dose depended way. It was reported earlier that flavonoids improved viability of cells and repressCCl 4causedhepatocyte’s cellular leakage ( Wu et al., 2006). Similarly, several doses of flower extracts have significantly moderated the ranges of aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), alkaline phosphatase (ALP) together with direct Bilirubin.
